title: The Girl in the Dream: Story of Supernatual and Ghosts
description: Dr. Sara Mohten was really down on her luck. Some of her patients died mysteriously on the surgical table and complaints were pressed against her. She had some health problems with no real medical explanations. She had dreams and woke up to find objects she saw in them beside her on the bed, a strand of hair, blood, dust or even rusty knives. Sara sought the help of Dr. Richard Giley, a psychiatrist, but how would a psychiatrist help a woman possessed?Ghosts and spirits are unreal products of the imagination, but Rani is a spirit who has sworn to make everyone acknowledge her existence. And she won't stop till everyone is forced to submit to her will and bow to her power.
author: Stephen Kai
